s:pt presents with Kidney for more than 4 weeks. he is a 29 yo white male car designer. denies any smoking he drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 69 in, Weight 183 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed AVAPRO - 150 mg by mouth daily, and ordered hemodialysis - vena cava.
